verses.name: Numbers 7:19
verses.text: He offered for his offering one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:20
verses.text: One spoon of gold of ten shekels, full of incense:

verses.name: Numbers 7:21
verses.text: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:22
verses.text: One kid of the goats for a sin offering:
